com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision

Class Vision

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.vision.Vision

  • public class Vision
extends java.lang.Object
    A Vision utility class. Used for initializing the library and contains functions for converting between normal Java objects and OpenCV's weird stuff (i.e. Color -> Scalar, RGB -> BGR)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vision()

      static org.opencv.core.Scalar toScalar(java.awt.Color c)
      Converts a Color to a Scalar (a class similar to Color that uses BGR instead of RGB)
